SPRthis 0.99.1

Create SPR Workflow package template

Source: R/sprthis.R
sprthis.Rd

Create SPR Workflow package template

sprthis(wfName = "SPRtest", analysis, path = tempdir(), baseurl = "<baseurl>")

Arguments

wfName

character vector with the new SPR Workflow package name.
analysis

character vector withe the analysis name.
path

A path. If it exists, it is used. If it does not exist, it will be used the temporary path..
baseurl

baseurl for the package

Value

Path to the newly created package.

Examples

sprthis(wfName = "SPRtest", analysis = "SPRtest", path = tempdir())
